record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 2

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, it is my understanding that H.R. 2 is at the desk and is due for a second reading.

record.chair: The Senator is correct. The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to this bill at this time.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
